name: grotesque festival
description:
Play as Juan.  A small child who wants to go to a festival after getting a free ticket. Unfortunately for Juan, there is also a cult wishing to bring forth an ancient evil to destroy his festival.

Juan must collect the three "Objects of Annihilation"  to banish this evil. But to do so he must enter the horrifying realm of the grotesques.

Can Juan stop the cult in time?

[disclaimer. game contains possibly frightening images and sounds for younger players]

Things to keep in mind when playing:

  • This is my first game I've made
  • The game is incomplete as my computer crashed and i lost the files right before the trial ended (There are a couple of glitches, such as George's sword becoming a hamburger or the sound for certain maps not loading).
  • I made this using RPG MAKER's free 20 day trial. 

Despite this, the game is beatable, I had planned multiple endings but only one of them is obtainable.

I'd assume the game would take about 10-20 minutes to complete. 

All artwork is done by me.
